journey.title: My Journey
journey.content:
I am a professional sushi chef and food technologist with over 20 years of experience in gastronomy. My journey began with classical culinary education and led to work in restaurants and production kitchens across Poland, Lithuania, Estonia, Germany, France, and Canada.

Over the years of practice, I have built a deep understanding of Japanese cuisine, product handling, and professional kitchen processes — from traditional techniques to modern technological solutions.

mission.title: My Mission
mission.content:
Through this blog and projects, I share practical knowledge of professional kitchens. My goal is to help chefs, restaurants, and food enthusiasts understand the product, technique, and technology that modern gastronomy is built on.

I believe that a strong kitchen starts not with a recipe, but with understanding the process.
